name: Battles of Beetles - Bosses clash !
description:
Have you ever dreamed to control biggest powerful beetles in the world ?
Here you are : « Battles Beetles: fight epic bosses' fleets, troops » is born for you !

Colorful Insects from ecuadorian rainforest, Brasilian jungle, and more … are now ready in epic Battles in nature.

Wilde life surprises one more time :
Indeed, after selecting your favourite Boss Beetle, and your competitors on CPU or multiplayer mode, be ready on Battlefield.
Press Beetle’ Back to release your fleet and troop on Battlefield.
Colonels, Lieutenants, soldiers keep their positions, defending you, attacking your enemies !
You may observe your enemies movements, and apply your strategy according your plan then you may become the Beetle King !
Be strong and strategic there is no mercy in middle wildlife.
Surrending is your choice ? You will disappear after few minutes like you never existed before.

Play in the middle of wildlife and become the Beetle King !

Features :
13 various beetles and more available for epic battles
4 kind of fighters = Boss, Colonel, Lieutenant, Soldier or starship trooper with their own attributes.
5 awesome Battlefields
2 Games play mode : « multiplayer on 1 device » and against CPU.
3 Levels of difficulties.

Many thanks to all P. B. team, developers, designers for full free contribution in this project.
Warm thanks to all our followers and supporters.
Feel Free to send message and or to review on app store : toygamestory@gmail.com
